groups.name: locksmith
groups.description: Configuration properties for Locksmith distributed locking.

properties.name: locksmith.lease-time
properties.description: The default time after which the lock is automatically released. This prevents deadlocks if a server crashes while holding a lock. Supports duration strings like '10m', '30s', '1h' or ISO-8601 format like 'PT10M'.

properties.name: locksmith.wait-time
properties.description: The default time to wait for acquiring a lock when using WAIT_AND_SKIP mode. If the lock cannot be acquired within this time, the method execution is skipped. Supports duration strings like '60s', '5m' or ISO-8601 format like 'PT1M'.

properties.name: locksmith.key-prefix
properties.description: The prefix to use for all lock keys in Redis. This helps namespace your locks and avoid conflicts with other applications sharing the same Redis instance.

properties.name: locksmith.debug
properties.description: When enabled, logs detailed information about lock operations including key resolution, lock type, timing, and acquisition status.
